ai-vv51:0.4_0: And the son of Maṇḍiya the Sakyan clan was rubbed
ai-vv51:2.1_0: I used to be an ordinary folk
ai-vv51:3.2_0: and my psychic power is found;
ai-vv51:3.3_0: having developed the noble eightfold path,
ai-vv51:3.4_0: See the light and the world.
ai-vv51:4.1_0: Those who remain for such a long time
ai-vv51:5.1_0: first from the son of the Sakyans.
